comments:
In an attempt to create an Eclipse instance that identifies its core install site as private I have a platform.xml where the site is defined as updateable="false".

When using the Install/Update wizard to find and install new features a null pointer is thrown after selecting a feature to install and arriving at the page where you choose a location.  

The one existing install site does not show (correct given it is updateable="false"), but a simple error dialog does show twice.  

After than it looks like it would let me create a new site and complete the install.

Shouldn't we be able to have a single install site in the beginning that is not updateable (private, goal is blocking other code added via the Install/Update wizard)?

The stack trace below was found when looking at the error log (one of two that are similar).
